identity.adventist.org is the official Identity Guidelines website of the Seventh-day Adventist world church

Seventh-day Adventists are devoted to helping people understand the Bible to find freedom, healing and hope.

Accessibility

Describe the design system's approach to accessibility

For inspiration, check out Salesforce’s Lightning Design System accessibility guidelines, and be sure to check out the fantastic a11yproject for an accessibility checklist, patterns, and resources.
